replies.bodyText: No. Not really. If we end up here then some exception got thrown from addToIndex and we must make sure we delete the data from the cache otherwise it will stay there forever. The only exception thrown from there is an ObjectClosedException, which indicates the whole index is about to close (or has just been) so we must clean up anyway.
